author: Reeves Jackson
title: Northern lights can be seen across north Georgia! See all the photos
text: ATLANTA — Believe it or not, the [northern lights](/article/weather/northern-lights-possible-over-georgia-tonight/85-8caec653-eaee-471a-a7ff-c3c12f944dac) were back over north Georgia on Thursday night! A phenomenon that is rarely seen this far south has now made two appearances in the Peach State here in 2024. But what is causing this? It is because there is a G4 geomagnetic storm reached the earth today. That is from a coronal mass ejection from the sun a couple of days ago. As this energy makes it to the earth, it disturbs the magnetic field, which can sometimes allow visibility of auroras in the sky. If you look north in the sky and see faint hues of red, purple, pink, or green -- that is the northern lights. Those in the state are sending in their magnificent photos of the northern lights in the clear, starry skies in Georgia. Keep sending in your photos on the 11Alive Weather Impact Facebook page or by using the "Near Me" section on the 11Alive app. Let's take a look at all the photos being sent in from 11Alive viewers across the northern part of the state:

author: Miguel Ponce
title: Vertedero Bonao lleva seis días con humareda
text:
Monseñor Nouel. El vertedero a cielo abierto donde depositan la basura el municipio de Bonao, lleva seis días afectado la salud de los moradores de varias comunidades, por la humareda que se desprende de un incendio.
La gran cantidad de humo que afecta a sectores como Hato Viejo, El Verde, Caribe y el municipio cabecera de Bonao, ha llevado a los alcaldes y encargados distritales que integran la provincia Monseñor Nouel tengan que solicitar la declaratoria del estado de emergencia.
Los comunitarios mostraron su malestar debido a que la humareda empieza a provocar problemas respiratorios.
Miguel Antonio Abad, capitán del cuerpo de bomberos de Bonao dijo que el denso humo y la contaminación derivada del fuego están afectando la calidad del aire y genera molestias respiratorias en la población.
“No tenemos certeza de cómo se incendió el vertedero, lo que sí sabemos es que el basurero está fuera de control”, expresó Abad. En el lugar se encuentran bomberos de Bonao, Sabana del Puerto y de Juma.
Se espera que se integren los cuerpos de bomberos de Maimón y Piedra Blanca. Los bomberos de Bonao evalúan si el siniestro fue provocado por manos criminales.
Los alcaldes de las demarcaciones afectadas por el incendio del vertedero consideran urgente una solución al problema de la humareda. Ante el clamor, la gobernación provincial de Monseñor Nouel se comunicó con los alcaldes para manifestar su disposición a trabajar de manera mancomunada.
“Ese humo nos acerca día y noche. Estamos en unas condiciones en las que podemos dormir en nuestras casas. Las autoridades que vengan y eliminen este vertedero y que no suceda lo mismo”, expresa Carlos Jiménez Peralta.
En ese sentido, Peralta está solicitando al presidente Luis Abinader intervenir para que sea clausurado el vertedero.
El Sindicato de Camioneros de Monseñor Nouel se ha sumado a los esfuerzos para contener la emergencia, colaborando con camiones cisterna y otras herramientas disponibles.

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP Now Have Seven Convenient Locations Throughout New York | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: NEW YORK, NY - Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP has a proven track record of successful cases, demonstrating their ability to navigate the complexities of personal injury law. Over the years, the firm has secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for its clients, ensuring they receive fair compensation for their hardships. The firm's success is built on a foundation of thorough investigation, strategic negotiation, and aggressive litigation when necessary. The attorneys at Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP are not only skilled litigators but also empathetic counselors. They understand that behind every case is a person whose life has been disrupted, and they strive to provide not just legal representation, but also support and guidance through a challenging time. This personalized approach has earned them a reputation for compassionate service and has made them a trusted choice for accident victims across New York. Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP is proud to serve clients across New York from their seven strategic locations. Each office is conveniently located, ensuring they're accessible and within reach for their clients. This extensive network reflects the firm's commitment to being available for their clients, ensuring they receive timely and efficient legal assistance when they need it most. Harlem Office: Situated in the vibrant heart of Harlem, this office is a beacon of support for accident victims in the area. It's easily accessible, encouraging local residents to seek the legal help they need. Bronx Office: The Bronx office is a cornerstone in the community, providing essential legal services to victims in one of the city's most populous boroughs. Brooklyn Office: Located in the bustling borough of Brooklyn, this office provides convenient access to top-tier legal advice for residents across the borough. Queens Office: Serving one of the most culturally diverse areas in the world, the Queens office is equipped to handle cases from a wide array of backgrounds. Staten Island Office: As the only office of its kind on Staten Island, this location ensures that even the residents of the city's least populated borough have access to exceptional legal services. Yonkers Office: Just north of the city, the Yonkers office extends Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP's reach beyond the city limits, bringing their expertise to clients in the surrounding suburbs. Nassau County Office: Serving clients on Long Island, this office makes world-class personal injury legal services available to those living outside of the five boroughs. These seven locations across New York City and beyond are testament to Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP's commitment to making their services accessible to all who need them. They understand the challenges that accompany seeking legal help after an accident, and their multiple locations aim to ease this process. Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP boasts a skilled team of accident attorneys who handle a wide range of accident cases. Their extensive experience and deep understanding of the legal landscape enable them to effectively counter tactics employed by insurance companies to deny or reduce claims. The firm's recent addition of new attorney firepower further strengthens its ability to fight for its clients. Individuals who have been hurt in any type of accident, including slips and falls in supermarkets or injuries caused by dogs, are encouraged to immediately consult with the firm. For those seeking to reclaim their future after an accident, Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP can be reached at [1-800-VICTIM2] ( [842-8462]). With their no-fee guarantee, potential clients can rest assured that they have nothing to lose and everything to gain by seeking legal support. To learn more about Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP, their services, or to find the nearest office, visit their website or call [1-800-VICTIM2] ( [842-8462]). ### For more information about Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP, contact the company here: Greenstein & Milbauer, LLP Rob Greenstein (800) 842-8462 greensteinmilbauersocial@gmail.com 1825 Park Ave New York, NY 10035
